attributes.action: To recognise the country of somaliland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As i am an Somaliland Represtentative i would like to ask you to recognise somaliland as soon as possible since we have been an independant country 15 years and is now time to be recognised as an country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
